Name: Toggle feature flag
Description: Toggle a LaunchDarkly feature flag on or off

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
$headers = @{ Authorization = "#{access-token}"; "content-type" = "application/json" }
$body = @( @{ op = "replace"; path = "/environments/#{environment-key}/on"; value = #{if flag-value}$true#{/if}#{unless flag-value}$false#{/unless} } )
$bodyAsJson = ConvertTo-Json -InputObject $body -Compress

Invoke-RestMethod 'https://app.launchdarkly.com/api/v2/flags/#{project-key}/#{key}' -Method Patch -Body $bodyAsJson -Headers $headers

Parameters.Name: project-key
Parameters.Label: Project key
Parameters.HelpText: The key of the project containing this feature flag

Parameters.Name: environment-key
Parameters.Label: Environment key
Parameters.HelpText: The key of the environment to change this feature flag value in

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Label: Feature flag key
Parameters.HelpText: The key of the feature flag you want to toggle

Parameters.Name: flag-value
Parameters.Label: Feature flag enabled
Parameters.HelpText: Enable targeting for this feature flag?
